snippet.title: Alone in the Dark Prologue | Release Teaser
snippet.description:
Get a taste of the terror to come with this stand-alone Prologue to Alone in the Dark – out now and available for free!

Experience a first atmospheric journey into the upcoming reimagination of Alone in the Dark. This playable teaser puts you in the tiny shoes of Grace Saunders – an 11-year-old girl delivering a letter, when things go horribly wrong…

Start exploring Derceto right now and prepare for the horror that awaits when Alone in the Dark releases on October 25th!

Download the Prologue and Pre-Order Alone in the Dark here: aloneinthedark.com

- Links & Info - 
Website: https://aloneinthedark.com 
Discord: https://www.discord.gg/aloneinthedark

- Socials - 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/THQNordic 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AITDGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aloneinthedarkgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thqnordic 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thqnordic 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thqnordic 

#AloneInTheDark #ReturnToDerceto
